info.author: Christopher S. Case
info.description: Python-Qt is a compatibility wrapper that hides the differences between PySide and PyQt4. It also provides a way to specify which set of bindings should be used. It's very useful for python applications that want to simply use Qt, and not care about which underlying bindings they're using.

info.name: python-qt
info.summary: Python compatibility wrapper for Qt Bindings (PySide/PyQt4)
info.html_description: Python-Qt is a compatibility wrapper that hides the differences between PySide and PyQt4. It also provides a way to specify which set of bindings should be used. It’s very useful for python applications that want to simply use Qt, and not care about which underlying bindings they’re using.
